data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Matheus Galdezani for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 2, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Coritiba advance rapidly upfield but Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows for offside.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ronaldo of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Robson (Coritiba) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 12, In Salvador Bahia attack through Daniel. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 15, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 18, Elber for Bahia drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rossi.
Rossi is back on his feet again.
In the minute 21, Bahia's Ronaldo breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 23, Matheus Galdezani (Coritiba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bahia's Daniel is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Sassa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Salvador Bahia drive forward through Juninho Capixaba. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sassa is back on the pitch.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba just outside Bahia's area.
In the minute 31, Coritiba are coming forward and Natanael gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Bahia throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 33, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia.
Coritiba are caught offside.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 37, Important block from the Bahia defence as Matheus Galdezani fires in a strike for Coritiba.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Bahia have been given a penalty...
In the minute 39, Sassa (Coritiba) gets a yellow card.
Rodriguinho converts the penalty to give Bahia a 1-0 lead.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 41, Matheus Galdezani (Coritiba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 43, Free kick Bahia.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Bahia throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Salvador.
Bahia's Rodriguinho misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Rodolfo (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
The second-half is underway in Salvador.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba make their first substitution with Jonathan replacing Natanael.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Robson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 54, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Bahia.
Coritiba drive forward but William Matheus is judged offside.
In the minute 56, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 57, Coritiba apply pressure at Arena Fonte Nova and Jose Monteiro goes close with a header against the post.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In the minute 59, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 62, Coritiba's Sassa gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Saldanha is replacing Rossi for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 64, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Ruy with Yan Sasse. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Barroca.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 66, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows against Bahia's Saldanha for offside.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 68, At Arena Fonte Nova, Nathan Silva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
The away team replace Nathan Silva with Rene Junior.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia's Daniel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, Coritiba's Igor Jesus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Coritiba's William Matheus attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Coritiba's Sassa is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Marco Antonio is on a sub for Daniel for Bahia.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 78, Eduardo Barroca is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Luiz Henrique replacing Matheus Galdezani.
Eduardo Barroca (Coritiba) is making a fifth substitution, with Nathan replacing Sassa.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Alesson is replacing Rodriguinho for the home team.
Zeca is replacing Juninho Capixaba for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 82, Bahia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Coritiba.
Coritiba push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Igor Jesus gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Bahia defence.
Bahia's Saldanha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 87, Coritiba's Yan Sasse has been booked in Salvador.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, In Salvador Coritiba attack through Rene Junior. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Bahia throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Coritiba pushes forward through Robson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
